Do we go straight and turn left? Donna: Right. Bob: Oh , we go straight and turn right... Donna: No , we turn left. Bob: But you say , " Right " . Donna: I mean , " Yes " . Bob: Then please say , " Yes " . Don’t say , " Right " ! Donna: OK. Bob: So we go down this road and turn left. Donna: Yes. Bob: Then we cross the street and turn right at the next corner. content: 40 Reading and writing 1 Look , listen , and read. Keeping fit Yao Ming plays basketball very well. He eats the right kind of food , so he can be healthy and strong. Deng Yaping is another good example. She works hard , and does a lot of training. She also eats healthy food. Healthy food , good habits , and exercise are important for you , too. Eat lots of healthy food , but don’t eat too much. Go to bed early , and don’t watch too much TV. Do lots of exercise like Yao Ming and Deng Yaping. When you exercise , you should be careful. Don’t hurt your legs or arms.

content: 74 More reading and writing 1 Look , listen , and read. The first Tree Planting Day in China was on March 12th , 1979. People all over China planted a lot of trees on that day. They helped to make our country green and beautiful. The Tree Planting Day The Tree Planting Day in China is on March 12th every year. How did it start? Do you know? The Tree Planting Day started in the US in 1872. t was this man’s idea. His name is J. Sterling Morton. He wanted people to plant a lot of trees and take care of them. Many people liked Mr. Morton’s idea , so the first Tree Planting Day started on April 10th , 1872.
